source.name: Introduction to Version Control: Git workflow
source.instructions:
### Drag the blocks to arrange the typical order of steps in the Git workflow. **Please use all of the blocks in your response.**

Click the button below to submit.

---
source.initial:
Create Repository
Edit Project
Add to Staging
Commit to Repository
Edit Project
Add to Staging
Commit to Repository
source.guidance:
The correct order of steps can be found below:
- Create Repository
- Edit Project
- Add to Staging
- Commit to Repository
- Edit Project
- Add to Staging
- Commit to Repository
